patthana19.6:1.1_0: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.6:1.1_1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.6:1.1_2: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.6:2.1_0: Naavitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.6:3.1_0: Naavitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.6:4.1_0: Hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa, ārammaṇe tiṁsa, adhipatiyā ekūnatiṁsa …pe…
